definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)

sentences.english: One class of interferons is used to treat chronic infection with HBV and HCV.
sentences.chinese: 其中一类的干扰素常被用来治疗乙肝或丙肝感染。

sentences.english: Interferons (IFN) belong to the family of antivirus proteins, which can inhibit some viruses proliferation.
sentences.chinese: 干扰素是一类抗病毒蛋白，它可阻止另一种病毒增殖。

sentences.english: new drugs based on the interferon .
sentences.chinese: 例如基于干扰素滴新药。

sentences.english: It is also known to promote more systemic reactions than interferon .
sentences.chinese: 比及干扰素更能导致全身反应。

sentences.english: Interferon is almost always host species-specific in function.
sentences.chinese: 干扰素在功能上通常是宿主种特异性。

sentences.english: Iron also can affect chronic hepatitis patients, response to interferon treatment.
sentences.chinese: 铁会影响慢性肝炎患者对干扰素的应答。

sentences.english: Interferons are produced by the immune system to fight infections and tumors.
sentences.chinese: 干扰素在免疫系统中是用来对抗感染和肿瘤的。

sentences.english: Intralesional injection of different interferons for CA was effective.
sentences.chinese: 局部注射不同的干扰素治疗尖锐湿疣具有一定疗效。

sentences.english: Pegylated interferon alpha-2a in e-negative patients has a very good response.
sentences.chinese: 聚乙二醇干扰素在e抗原阴性的患者中应答非常好。

sentences.english: How do you evaluate the contribution in this field and the development on interferon industry?
sentences.chinese: 您是怎样评价这个领域的贡献和干扰素工业的发展的？

sentences.english: Also the drug interferon and ribavirin decreases the risk of relapse and decrease the risk of resistance.
sentences.chinese: 干扰素和利巴韦林能降低复发以及耐药的风险。

sentences.english: The oncologist invented a new kind of interferon to prevent cancer.
sentences.chinese: 那位肿瘤学家发明了一种可以预防癌症的干扰素。

sentences.english: High-dose interferon can inhibit viremia, make an illness see better.
sentences.chinese: 大剂量干扰素能抑制病毒血症，使病情见好转。

sentences.english: Objective To observe effect of preventing relapse of interferon ointment for condyloma acuminatum(CA).
sentences.chinese: 目的观察干扰素软膏在预防尖锐湿疣复发中的作用。

sentences.english: Interferon has a lot of potential toxicities , and patients need to be seen more frequently.
sentences.chinese: 干扰素有很多的毒副反应，需要观察的更为频繁。

definition: Lamivudine, reverse transcriptase inhibitor marketed by GlaxoSmithKline and widely used in the treatment of hepatitis B and AIDS/brand names include Zeffix, Heptovir, Epivir and Epivir-HBV
